Chapter 279

Chapter 279: Beginning to improve

Translator: 549690339

An hour later, the two of them appeared in a secluded valley.

This place was very remote and deserted. It was a good place to cultivate.

Without saying anything, the two of them sat down cross-legged, took out the Yiyuan ancient panaceas, and began to cultivate.

He took out a Jade bottle and opened the cap. Immediately, a medicinal fragrance filled the air.

The Yiyuan ancient spiritual pill was a medium Lv 4 medicinal pill. It was of great help to a martial arts Grandmaster and was priceless.

Lu Ming poured out one pill and swallowed it. In an instant, a powerful devouring force came from the nine Dragons ‘bloodline. The medicinal power of the Yiyuan ancient spirit pill was continuously devoured and refined.

Before long, the medicinal effects of the pill were completely refined. Lu Ming felt that his cultivation level had increased by a level.

The medicinal power of a Yiyuan ancient spiritual pill was at least dozens of times that of a class 9 Lv 3 demonic pill.

At this moment, Lu Ming opened his eyes and looked at Xie nianqing.

He gasped when he saw the huge black Lotus floating above Xie nianqing’s head.

This was obviously Xie nianqing’s bloodline. However, there were nine blood-red chakra Rings shining around the Black Lotus. It was a breathtaking sight.

A ninth-level bloodline. Xie nianqing’s bloodline had actually reached the ninth level. How terrifying.

Xie nianqing had not broken through to Grandmaster and awakened his second bloodline.

In other words, her first bloodline had reached level nine.

this little demoness ‘bloodline is terrifyingly high. No wonder her combat strength is so strong. She’s a true genius!

Lu Ming sighed secretly. To be honest, this was the first time he had seen Xie nianqing’s bloodline.

her first bloodline has already reached Ordinary Level 9. I wonder what level her second bloodline will be? ”

Lu Ming could not help but look forward to it.

Lu Ming continued to refine the primordial spirit pill.

The surging energy was constantly transformed into essential Qi. Lu Ming’s cultivation level was improving rapidly.

Soon, the bottle of pills was refined and Lu Ming’s cultivation was approaching the middle ninth grade great Martial Master realm.

Continue to refine the Gu

Half a day later, Lu Ming had refined twelve bottles of pills in a row, and his cultivation had risen to the peak of the ninth grade great master realm.

At the same time, Xie nianqing’s cultivation had also reached the peak of ninth grade great Martial Master.

After reaching the peak of the ninth grade great Martial Master realm, one could start to take blood refinement pills and blood refinement crystals to condense a second bloodline and accumulate energy for the awakening of the second bloodline.

This process was known as blood solidification, also known as half-Grandmaster.

During the blood solidification process, his blood Qi was exuberant and even stronger than a peak ninth grade great Martial Master.

A blood refining crystal appeared in Xie nianqing’s hand and she swallowed it. Immediately, her spine emitted a strong blood-red light.

Lu Ming did not waste any time. He also took out a blood refining crystal and swallowed it.

As soon as the blood refining crystal entered his mouth, it turned into blood Qi energy, which was absorbed by his spine and began to condense under the first bloodline.

A blood-red light began to appear in that place. As the blood Qi poured in, it slowly became brighter.

In a few breaths, the blood Qi of a blood refining crystal was completely absorbed. Lu Ming took out a few at once and swallowed them in one go.

The blood-red light on his spine grew larger and brighter.

Very soon, the dozens of blood refining crystals that Lu Ming had obtained were all used up.

Then, he made a grabbing motion in the air and a bunch of blood refinement pills appeared. He stuffed them into his mouth.

After a while, he grabbed another handful.

At this moment, he suddenly realized that there was someone in front of him, and he couldn’t help but open his eyes.

He saw a pair of bright eyes staring at him in surprise.

It was Xie nianqing.

“What are you doing, nest? I’m scared to death!”

Lu Ming shouted.

Xie nianqing blinked his big eyes and asked, ” “You have blood refinement pills? How many do you have left?”

“I do have blood refinement pills. How many are none of your business?”

Lu Ming said.

“Can you give me some?”

Xie nianqing stammered, as if he found it difficult to speak.

“I won’t give it to you. I’ll give it to you so that you can break through and step on me in the future!”

Lu Ming firmly rejected the idea.

“Hmph, do you think that I can’t step on you if you don’t give me the blood refinement pill?”

Xie nianqing snorted and gritted his teeth, revealing a few white teeth.

Then, he turned around and walked to the side.

However, in less than a minute, she came back and stared at Lu Ming with her big eyes.

“What do you want now?” Lu Ming asked, feeling speechless.

“I’ll buy it. I’ll buy the blood refinement pill from you, okay? How many crystals do you want? You can also use treasures to exchange for it. ”

Xie nianqing said.

“Oh? Using treasures to exchange? That’s fine. How about this, I’ll tell you a few treasures, and if you have them, I’ll exchange them.”

Lu Ming said.

“Alright, go ahead!” Xie nianqing said.

“Mysterious yang spirit, ten square bone banner”

Lu Ming listed five types of treasures in a row.

These five heavenly materials and earthly treasures were all required to cultivate the fifth stage of the true war Dragon technique.

Unfortunately, Xu and Xie nianqing both shook their heads, indicating that they didn’t.

if you don’t have it, how can you exchange it? How about this, give me some dragon essence or dragon essence, and I can exchange it with you!

Lu Ming pursed his lips.

I don’t have dragon essence or dragon essence, but I do have a flood Dragon Bone bead. What do you think? ”

Xie nianqing asked hopefully.

“What? Flood Dragon Bone bead? You really have one? Why don’t you take it out and have a look?”

Lu Ming said anxiously.

Xie nianqing’s palm glowed, and the next moment, a fiery red bone bead the size of a baby’s fist appeared in his palm.

it’s really a water Dragon’s bone bead. And it’s a fire water Dragon’s bone bead!

Lu Ming was overjoyed.

Cultivating the true war Dragon technique didn’t necessarily require those materials. There were still some substitutes, but these substitutes were more precious.

For example, the items on the true Dragon’s body were all priceless treasures. Having just one of them would allow the true war Dragon technique to break through.

Although flood Dragons weren’t true dragons, they had the bloodline of true dragons and were extremely rare mutants. They also had some functions.

Lu Ming had only mentioned it casually. He did not expect Xie nianqing to really have such a treasure.

“Let me see!”

Lu Ming took the Water Dragon Bone bead and studied it carefully.

the flood Dragon that produced this bone bead has a very profound cultivation base. As long as I have this bone bead and another material, I can successfully break through to the fifth stage of the true war Dragon technique.

Lu Ming thought in his heart.

“How is it? I’ll exchange it for 2000 blood refinement pills from you!”

Xie nianqing said.

“Two thousand? You wish, you’re asking for too much.”

Lu Ming was shocked and shouted.

this is a water dragon Bone Pearl. I spent a lot of money to get it. 2000 blood refinement pills is not a lot.

Xie nianqing said.

“Five hundred!” Lu Ming said.

“What? Aren’t you cutting too much? One thousand five hundred, no less. ”

Xie nianqing said through gritted teeth.

“Eight hundred, no more.”

Lu Ming’s lips trembled.

“One thousand two hundred!”

“Nine hundred!”

…

one thousand, one thousand blood refinement pills. I can’t go any lower. If you go any lower, I won’t trade anymore.

Xie nianqing said viciously.

“Good! Deal!”

Lu Ming agreed with a look of heartache.
